title: Should I Take This Job?
description:
Lindsay's call to Dr. Laura about a job opportunity at her kids' school takes a turn when she reveals that she's lost the spark in her marriage. - Dr. Laura: "Bring some joy into your life in a way that fits your current reality."

What could you do today to add a little spark to your marriage? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
